name: BottomBoosters
description:
Use WASD or ARROWS to move and turn.

Blast astroids and enemies to gain score.

Use powerups to your tactical advantage.

How high of a score can you get?

Play with a friend in Coop mode and respawn.

Play against a friend in verus mode by blasting them in the face.

Who will be the last man standing?

Sometimes you will controll 2 ships where only the one with the hovering healthbar is the ship that can take damage.
